vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
EtherGet.getTokens (patch_3.sol#26-30) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(addr.call.value(0)()) (patch_3.sol#28)

vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
EtherGet.getTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(addr.call.value(0)()) (patch_3.sol#28)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function transfer(address _to, uint _value) public returns (bool success);

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function balanceOf(address _owner) public constant returns (uint balance);

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_3.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
